document.full_text: a former worker at a rural credit cooperative in china lighted a bottle full of gasoline and threw it into a meeting of his former colleagues on friday morning, injuring 49 people, officials said.
document.title: asia: china: credit cooperative is firebombed
lines_and_colors: a former worker at a rural credit cooperative in china lighted a bottle full of gasoline and threw it into a meeting of his former colleagues on friday morning, injuring 49 people, officials said.
